name: Aswang Detective: The case of New York DEMO
name_original: Aswang Detective: The case of New York DEMO
description:
Aswang Detective: The Case of New York is a Vampire based Detective game taking place in New York City. It is a turn based first person dungeon crawler. It uses a meter based combat system along with a weakness and a boost combat system.

This is only a demo for an in progress game.

It has:

>11 songs

>Six main types of enemies

>Two major bosses

>One dungeon with five floors and one dungeon with one main floor

It takes around 40-60 minutes to beat, but I would add 10 minutes to that time if you want to see everything
